argGroup.arg: <help short="Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=`."/>

help.short: The name of the restore point collection.
The name of the restore point.
Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.
The expand expression to apply on the operation. 'InstanceView' retrieves information about the run-time state of a restore point.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="excludeDisks">
<prop type="array" name="diskRestorePoints">
<prop type="array<@InstanceViewStatus_read>" name="statuses">
<prop type="array" name="publicKeys" identifiers="path">
<prop type="array" name="secrets">
<prop type="array" name="vaultCertificates" identifiers="certificateUrl">
<prop type="array" name="additionalUnattendContent">
<prop type="array" name="listeners">
<prop type="array" name="dataDisks" identifiers="lun">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

argGroup.arg: <help short="Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=`."/>

help.short: The name of the restore point collection.
The name of the restore point.
Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<help short="Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=`."/>
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.excludeDisks" options="exclude-disks" group="">

help.short: Gets the creation time of the restore point.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="excludeDisks">
<prop type="array" name="diskRestorePoints">
<prop type="array<@InstanceViewStatus_read>" name="statuses">
<prop type="array" name="publicKeys" identifiers="path">
<prop type="array" name="secrets">
<prop type="array" name="vaultCertificates" identifiers="certificateUrl">
<prop type="array" name="additionalUnattendContent">
<prop type="array" name="listeners">
<prop type="array" name="dataDisks" identifiers="lun">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<help short="Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=`."/>
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.excludeDisks" options="exclude-disks" group="">

help.short: Resource Id of the source restore point from which a copy needs to be created.
Gets the creation time of the restore point.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="excludeDisks">
<prop type="array" name="diskRestorePoints">
<prop type="array<@InstanceViewStatus_read>" name="statuses">
<prop type="array" name="publicKeys" identifiers="path">
<prop type="array" name="secrets">
<prop type="array" name="vaultCertificates" identifiers="certificateUrl">
<prop type="array" name="additionalUnattendContent">
<prop type="array" name="listeners">
<prop type="array" name="dataDisks" identifiers="lun">
